coreAtributes.name: Mailed Trousers
coreAtributes.description: A pair of heavy-duty trousers, made of thick layers of quilted cloth. They conceal mail between their layers, providing excellent protection. They also have a metal codpiece riveted to the groin.

displacementText.playerSelf: You undo and take off your Mailed Trousers.
displacementText.playerNPC: You undo and take off [npc.name]'s Mailed Trousers.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear [npc.name]'s Mailed Trousers off their legs.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] undoes and takes off their Mailed Trousers.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] undoes and takes off your Mailed Trousers.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears your Mailed Trousers off your legs.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] undoes and takes off [npc2.name]'s Mailed Trousers.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] tears [npc2.name]'s Mailed Trousers off their legs.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on and do up your Mailed Trousers.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s Mailed Trousers onto their legs and do them up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You haul [npc.name]'s Mailed Trousers up their legs.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] pulls on and does up their Mailed Trousers.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] pulls your Mailed Trousers onto your legs and does them up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] hauls your Mailed Trousers up your legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] pulls [npc2.name]'s Mailed Trousers onto their legs and does them up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] hauls [npc2.name]'s Mailed Trousers up their legs.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your Mailed Trousers.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull up your Mailed Trousers.
